headline: Morgan Stanley Maintains a Sell Rating on Bristol-Myers Squibb (BMY), Sets a $34 PT
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) is one of the best cheap stocks under $50 to buy now. headline: Bristol Myers' Drug Flunks Blood Cancer-Associated Anemia Trial
summary: Bristol Myers Squibb & Co. (NYSE:BMY) on Friday announced topline results from the Phase 3 INDEPENDENCE trial evaluating Reblozyl (luspatercept-aamt) with concomitant janus kinase inhibitor (JAKi) therapy in adult patients with myelofibrosis-associated anemia receiving red blood cell (RBC) transfusions. The study did not meet its primary endpoint of RBC transfusion independence during any consecutive 12-week period, starting within the first 24 weeks of treatment, compared to placebo (p=0.0674).

The study did not meet its primary endpoint of RBC transfusion independence during any consecutive 12-week period, starting within the first 24 weeks of treatment, compared to placebo (p=0.0674).
